org.hibernate.search.backend.impl.lucene

Class ScheduledCommitPolicy

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hibernate.search.backend.impl.lucene.AbstractCommitPolicy
      • org.hibernate.search.backend.impl.lucene.ScheduledCommitPolicy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CommitPolicy

    public final class ScheduledCommitPolicy
extends AbstractCommitPolicy
    Commit policy that will commit at a regular intervals defined by configuration or immediately on explicit flush requests
    Author:
    gustavonalle
